results.name: Number of points of L1 norm 4 in cubic lattice Z^n.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, Low-Dimensional Lattices VII: Coordination Sequences, Proc. Royal Soc. London, A453 (1997), 2369-2389 (pdf).

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-10,10,-5,1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + A035597(n) + A035597(n-1). - _Bruce J. Nicholson_, Mar 11 2018
maple: f := proc(d,m) local i; sum( 2^i*binomial(d,i)*binomial(m-1,i-1),i=1..min(d,m)); end; # n=dimension, m=norm
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
